---
name: Spike
about: Time-boxed research or decision-making task
title: "[Spike] <question or decision to resolve>"
labels: ["type:spike"]
---

## Question / Decision
What needs to be explored or decided?

## Why This Matters
Why do we need this spike? What future work depends on it?

## Scope of Investigation
What will be researched or prototyped?
What will NOT be explored?

## Approach
How will this spike be conducted?
(e.g., docs review, prototype, comparison)

## Deliverables
What artifacts are expected?
(e.g., recommendation, doc, code sample)

## Decision Criteria
What factors will influence the final decision?

## Timebox
Max time allowed (e.g., 1 day, 2 days).

## Risks
What happens if this spike is inconclusive?

## Definition of Done
- Findings documented
- Clear recommendation made
- Next steps identified
